venue.name: Boston Affilaite Marketing Networking Group @ iBasis in Burlington, MA

item.description:
Boston Affiliate Marketing Networking Roundtable Meetup

A new spin off to our SEO group to help those that want to meet up during the day to focus on affiliate marketing.


Local Boston Affiliates & Affiliate Marketing Managers Wanted!


The Boston Affiliate Marketing Roundtable is a group of Boston affiliate managers and affiliates that meet in a monthly open round table discussion to share tips, strategies and develop long term partnership
with in the local Boston affiliate marketing community.


Meets the 3rd Thursday of the month at 2:30pm Starting in 2007


However with Linkshare San Fran & Affiliate Summit in las Vegas.

The first meeting will be the following Thursday on Jan 25th.


Location: Hosted at iBasis in Burlington, MA with a fridge full of drinks and snacks provided.


Agenda:


2:30 to 3:30pm Roundtable Discussion. Each Attendee will be given a slot of time to share tips and find support from fellow members. The group also provides a monthly check of support to your monthly tasks and goals


3:30 to 4:00pm Guest Speaker &/or Guest Affiliate or Merchant website to be reviewed for tips


4:00 to 4:30pm Flexible one on one time to set up individual networking opportunities with Am's & Affiliates


Some attendees may want to arrange one on ones to meet up for lunch prior or coffee after or ditch the group and head out to the Burlington Mall!


Don't tell your boss, but the meeting gets out before traffic piles up on 95, so that you can get home early as an extra perk for attending...


New Members & Guest speakers welcome!


Contat Group organization

Brian Hawkins
Affilaite Marketing Manager
www.Pingo.com/affiliate.do
www.SuperAffiliateBluePrint.com
bhawkins /at/ pingo.com
781-505-7865
